entry.title: Merit 54195 - Unified Quick-Change Disc Deburring & Finishing Silicon Carbide 6 Density Fine 3 Inch x 1/4 Inch 66261054195
entry.summary:
Vendor: Merit
Type: Quick Change Discs
Price: 9.44

[shortdesc]
  • Quickly put a smooth, well-blended finish on a metal, wood, or masonry surface by attaching the Merit Deburr/Blend S/C fine grit TR (Type III) non-woven quick-change unified wheel to a right-angle grinder
  • This fine-grit wheel conforms to a variety of surface shapes and requires less frequent wheel dressing for added efficiency
  • The silicon carbide grain ensures a bright scratch pattern, while the resin bond formula reduces smearing for a clean, even finish.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Merit
    Diameter 3 Inch
    Grade Fine
    Product Type Quick Change Discs

    Product Information

  • Silicon carbide grain for faster blending and finer brighter scratch pattern
  • Resin bond formula produces smear-free results
  • Hold shape well for less wheel dressing
  • Fine grit for final surface blending on a variety of metals and surface shapes
    		•

entry.summary:
Vendor: Merit
Type: Quick Change Discs
Price: 8.06

[shortdesc]

  • A durable design featuring an aluminum oxide abrasive and a smear-free resin bond formula helps the wheel retain its shape for less wheel dressing

entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 1.41

[shortdesc]

3M Standard Abrasives Quick Change TS Surface Conditioning FE Disc, 840332, MED, 2 in

  • 3M™ Standard Abrasives™ Quick Change TS Surface Conditioning FE Disc 840332 is the best material when high contact pressure and stock removal are required
  • It provides a more compact structure of non-woven fibers than 3M™ Standard Abrasives™ Buff and Blend Products
  • It has a woven fabric (scrim) embedded in the nylon structure to provide additional strength and durability for edge work, deburring and efficient blending of all metal types
  • The Quick Change TS System is the most popular style for safety, productivity and fast disc changes
  • Change discs by simply twisting to unlock the disc from the holder pad.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • Helps to remove burrs, weld spatter, die cast flash and parting lines
  • Blends mill marks, tool marks, mismatches, scratch patterns
  • High initial and extended rate of cut
  • Most efficient on ferrous materials
  • Easy to change

entry.title: 3M SB21552 - Scotch-Brite Roloc + Clean And Strip xt Pro Disc, Tr+, S Extra-Coarse, 4 in x 0.5 in (10.16 cm x 1.27 cm) Sb21552 7100173794
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 9.58

[shortdesc]

Scotch-Brite Roloc+ Clean and Strip XT Pro Disc, TR+, S XCS, 4 in x 0.5 in (10.16 cm x 1.27 cm)

  • Scotch-Brite™ Roloc™+ Clean and Strip XT Pro Disc features silicon carbide abrasive mineral incorporated into an open nylon web
  • It effectively removes rust, paint, mill scale, coatings, and adhesives from surfaces without significantly altering the base material
  • The high-strength fibres are highly conformable, resist chunking and loading, and perform well on edges.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • Quickly removes rust, paint, mill scale, and coatings from metal
  • High-strength fibre resists chunking and performs well on edges
  • High conformability provides a larger contact patch for faster removal rates
  • Silicon carbide mineral cuts aggressively and leaves a fine finish
  • Resists loading for consistent cutting action
  • High speed rating, low vibration, and low spark
  • 3M™ Roloc™+ Attachment System makes disc changes easy
  • Requires use of 3M™ Roloc™+ Backup Pad (sold separately)
  • Ideal for applications where running a disc on its edge is necessary
    		•

entry.title: 3M SB07529 - Scotch-Brite Roloc Bristle Disc 07529, 3 in 120 White, 4 Box Sb07529 7100138322
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 114.93

[shortdesc]

Scotch-Brite Roloc Bristle Disc 07529, 3 in 120 White, 4 boxes per case

  • Featuring 3M Ceramic Abrasive Grain technology and moulded, flexible bristles, the Scotch-Brite™ Bristle Disc provides more surface contact than wire brushes and helps remove surface contaminants from large areas
  • This disc's abrasive blend continually self-sharpens to help the disc run fast and last longer for enduring performance
  • Use this disc to help remove paint, stains, adhesives, weld burns, rust, heavy oxides, and surface contaminants.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • Molded, abrasive filled bristles strip, deburr, blend, finish, polish, clean, and remove coatings more effectively than wire brushes
  • Proprietary 3M Ceramic Abrasive Grain blend provides high degree of finish quality throughout the life of the disc
  • Bristle spacing is ideal for coating removal and other high-loading substances
  • Flexible bristles conform to contours to produce consistent finishes, even on complex parts
  • Convenient 3M Roloc attachment system offers quick and easy disc change-out for multi-step finishing processes
    		•
